duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform DOD 5000 lifecycle systems engineering and manage technical activities for development, test, and fielding.
Decompose operational requirements into system functional requirements and technical specifications.

Interface with members of a multi-disciplinary product team to identify system requirements and oversee system design, development, integration, and product verification testing at the component and system level.
Interface with stakeholders and OEMs to ensure requirements are met and expected availability and performance levels are achieved.
Develop and deliver technical and program briefs to government and contractor personnel at all levels.
Serve as technical Subject Matter Expert for sensor technology and support PM staff with in-depth knowledge of sensor phenomenology, design, and performance.
Design and/or conduct sensor performance modeling and simulation using validated tools based on sensor design parameters.
Translate operational performance requirements into technical design specifications.
Manage clearance and field testing operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
